barracks.description: Trains infantry units and basic military personnel, providing the backbone for your army.

stables.description: Specializes in cavalry units for rapid response and hit-and-run tactics.

armory.description: Equips units with improved gear, increasing their combat effectiveness on the battlefield.

watchtower.description: Provides early warning of enemy advances and grants a defensive bonus to nearby units.

siege_workshop.description: Crafts siege engines, such as catapults and battering rams, for breaking enemy fortifications.
